title: 'RHOC' Star Meghan Edmonds' Mom Calls Cops on Jim Amid Nasty Divorce
text:
“Real Housewives of Orange County” star Meghan Edmonds’ mom called the police on her daughter’s estranged husband.

According to US Weekly, The reality star's mom was staying at the St. Louis home where Meghan lived with Jim Edmonds. Meghan was out attending a Baby Shark concert with her three kids.

The outlet claims Jim showed up to the home while Meghan’s mom was home. Her mother called the police who arrived at the property. Jim told them he only wanted to get his clothes. Police then told Meghan’s mother to leave the home.

The police situation comes days after Jim filed for divorce from Meghan. She has accused him of having an affair with their former nanny, Carly Wilson.

Meghan and Jim got married back in October 2014. She would join the cast of “Real Housewives of Orange County” in 2015.

The two appeared on the reality show from season 10-12. Meghan came back this season as a guest of the Housewives.

Following her departure from the reality show, Jim has been accused of cheating with another woman.

Back in June, Jim was accused of sending an XXX video to a mistress while Meghan was in the hospital giving birth to their twins.

At the time, Jim admitted to a “lapse in judgment” and said he engaged in an "inappropriate conversation" with the woman -- identified as "baseball madame" -- but insists the two never had a physical relationship during his marriage to Meghan.
